Vampire Advanced Ability (Leathery Wings.description: Your ability to fly fully manifests. You gain a fly Speed of 15 feet at all times. This increases to 25 feet at 12th level.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Memory Nourish.name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Memory Nourishment)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Memory Nourish.description: When you Drink Blood, you can choose to alter, enhance, or erase the memory that you view as if casting 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{Rewrite Memory}, with the DC being equal to your class DC or spell DC (whichever is higher). @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]

Vampire Advanced Ability (Necrarchy).name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Necrarchy)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Necrarchy).description: You can call upon undead to aid you in battle. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{summon undead} once per day as an innate spell of the tradition you chose with the basic ability, heightened to half your level rounded up.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Qi Nourishment.name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Qi Nourishment)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Qi Nourishment.description: The third time you successfully gain temporary hit points by Drinking Blood from creatures within a single minute, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute. You can only use this extra action to Strike or Stride.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Rigor Mortis).name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Rigor Mortis)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Rigor Mortis).description: When you Leap, you can add an additional 10 feet to the horizontal and/or vertical distance without affecting the DC, on top of the distance granted by your Rigor Mortis. Additionally, you can take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{Drop Prone} action to become prone willingly.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Shadow Form).name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Shadow Form)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Shadow Form).description: You can fully transform into a being of pure shadow at will. Your Shadow Form is no longer limited to once per hour, and you can remain in it indefinitely. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.0QHAcssESTgeWk19]{Shadow Escape} free action.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Sharp Fangs).name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Sharp Fangs)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Sharp Fangs).description: When you critically succeed on an attack roll with your fangs, you may immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.p0I1DIcTJcAmJqz4]{Drink Blood} on the target as a free action. If the target does not meet the normal requirements of Drink Blood, you must make an Athletics check as if they were grabbed. This is a critical specialization effect.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Sickening Aura.name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Sickening Aura)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Sickening Aura.description: An enemy entering or starting its turn in a 10-foot emanation from you must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your spell DC or class DC, whichever is higher. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and cannot reduce their sickened value below 1 while within the aura. On a success, the creature is immune to this effect of your aura for one minute, or one hour on a critical success.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Sustaining Blo.description: You’ve learned the methods to create thralls out of those you feed your blood. These thralls are counted separately from other minions under your control, but you can still only actively control up to four minions at once.

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUeRTriJkMlMlVrk]{bind undead} once per day as a divine innate spell, heightened to half your level rounded up. At 12th level or higher, you can select the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.fGMC20A7RspKCxSg]{Improved Command Undead (HWW)} cleric feat using one of your class feats.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Speed.name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Speed)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Speed.description: Your speed becomes legendary. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.p2I4o9Cc6UrXvjhO]{Furious Sprint} barbarian feat. It loses the rage trait for you.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Stren.name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Strength)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Stren.description: You can move with such ease that you barely worry about gravity. You treat falls as 25 times less than their actual distance for the purposes of falling damage (to a maximum of 30 damage from falling 1,500 or more feet). Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TVFfTP9fHRidwBlW]{Cloud Jump} skill feat.

Vampire Advanced Ability (Withered Flesh.name: Vampire Advanced Ability (Withered Flesh)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Withered Flesh.description: Your flesh has toughened similar to jerky, protecting you from all but the worst ailments. You gain immunity to disease and poisons, and increase your maximum hit points by your level.

Vampiric Speed.name: Vampiric Speed
Vampiric Speed.description:
Basic Ability: Your land speed increases by 5 feet. You also move at full Speed while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Tracking}.

Advanced Ability: Your speed becomes legendary. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.p2I4o9Cc6UrXvjhO]{Furious Sprint} barbarian feat. It loses the rage trait for you.

Vampiric Strength.name: Vampiric Strength
Vampiric Strength.description:
Basic Ability: Your physical form is enhanced in undeath, allowing you to move and maneuver with exceptional ease. You become trained in Athletics (or another skill of your choice if you are already trained). You gain your choice of the Quick Jump or Powerful Leap skill feats, and gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and Fortitude DCs.

Advanced Ability: You can move with such ease that you barely worry about gravity. You treat falls as 25 times less than their actual distance for the purposes of falling damage (to a maximum of 30 damage from falling 1,500 or more feet). Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TVFfTP9fHRidwBlW]{Cloud Jump} skill feat.

Withered Flesh.name: Withered Flesh
Withered Flesh.description:
Basic Ability: Your body is withered, distorted, and generally looks closer to a corpse. You double any circumstance bonuses and resistances granted by your basic undead benefits and advanced undead benefits, but suffer a -2 penalty to Diplomacy and Deception checks. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.fWg5HT95bFBxKhNA]{Change Shape} action

Advanced Ability: Your flesh has toughened similar to jerky, protecting you from all but the worst ailments. You gain immunity to disease and poisons, and increase your maximum hit points by your level.
